repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:buster

# Create app directory
WORKDIR /app

# Install app dependencies
# RUN npm -g install serve
RUN npm -g install gatsby-cli && npm cache clean --force;

COPY package*.json ./

RUN npm ci

# Bundle app source
COPY . .

# Build static files
RUN npm run build

# serve on port 8080
# CMD ["serve", "-l", "tcp://0.0.0.0:8080", "public"]
CMD ["gatsby", "serve", "--verbose", "--prefix-paths", "-p", "8080", "--host", "0.0.0.0"]
